name: Sarah Fischmann
tagline: Computer Science Major at Swarthmore College
body:
## About Me  
![My Face](https://github.com/sarahkf/sarahkf.github.io/blob/master/My%20Face.png?raw=true) I'm a Computer Science major at Swarthmore college with minors in Philosophy and Statistics. I am especially interested in programming languages and Computer Science education.

## Projects  
### Implemented tuples for [Pyret](https://code.pyret.org) programming language.  
[Pyret](https://code.pyret.org) is a programming language designed for programming education used as part of the [Bootstrap](http://www.bootstrapworld.org/index.shtml) curriculum and in undergraduate introductory computer science courses. Over summer 2016, I modified Pyret's compiler to enable the use of tuples in the language. I also attended [CSPD week](http://www.cspdweek.org/) as a facilitator for Bootstrap. Visit [here](https://pyret-horizon.herokuapp.com/editor#share=0B4eAwTi304XcanAwR3BjaWpWeFk) to see some examples of tuples in Pyret.  


## Contact
